features: Snowshoes Frame: Contour frame: 7075-T6 aluminum for toughness and lightness.
Harness: Contact Sprint is flexible in cold temperatures and retains its grip on your race footwear.

Closure System: Boa® closure system: User-friendly, winter-proof and lifetime warranty. "The best closure system on the market.", New Slipnot quick cinch heel strap and friction buckle. Glove-tested at -45° Celsius.
Crampons: Attack crampons: Aggressive crampons that offer great control on the tracks. Made with 7075-T6 black anodized aluminum.
Pivot: Tight and flexible pivot that holds the foot and adapts to any terrain.
Decking: Snowfree surface: Excellent snow shedding from deck., Wrap-around decking for light, no-snag performance; built for speed.
Ergonomics: Narrow width optimizing surface area (123 in2/794 cm2) for optimum stride efficiency.
Certification/Approval: Designed according to the USSSA standards for snowshoe racing.
